description: This file is a C header file that declares function prototypes and macros for the Dslh Var Entity in a DSL Home Model implementation. It provides interface definitions for object creation, initialization, token management, and other lifecycle methods related to the Vareo component.

methods.name: DslhCreateVarEntity
methods.description: Creates a new variable entity object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: DslhVareoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Vareo object with specified contexts.

methods.name: DslhVareoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects related to the Vareo.

methods.name: DslhVareoAddTokenValue
methods.description: Adds a token string and associated enum code to the Vareo token table.

methods.name: DslhVareoCfgTokenTable
methods.description: Configures the token table size for the Vareo object.

methods.name: DslhVareoGetTokenValueByString
methods.description: Retrieves a token value object by its string representation.

methods.name: DslhVareoGetTokenValueByCode
methods.description: Retrieves a token value object by its enum code.
